title: How does one move a house to a new location? - Quora

response.answer_text: In short, you disconnect it from the foundation, jack it up, put a trailer under it, tow it to the new location, put it on the new foundation. The details of this make it complex and expensive, not least of which is the damage caused by moving, which houses generally aren’t designed for. I imagine a house that was made for earthquakes is probably better. Towing also requires a clear path, which may very well not be available.
